backtrader - 1.9.80-No-Pandas 
           - working on Linux also on Windows with proper Plots! Such wow, much nice!
           - Fully removed "Pandas" Datafeeds > replaced by Polars. Such wow, much nice!
           - Dropped legacy support for certain old forex brokers, including Oanda
           - Tweaks, fixes and improvements to the codebase
           - Custom Strategy and Indicator classes
==========
